summary.span: 用于访问活动实例的、包含一获取/设置委托对的类。

span.span: A class containing a get/set delegate pair to access an argument in an activity instance.

summary.span: 获取或设置将参数设置到活动实例中的方法。

span.span: Gets or sets the method to set an argument into an activity instance.

value.span: 设置参数到活动实例中的方法。

span.span: The method to set an argument into an activity instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用分配给此属性的方法是设置模型属性的值的首选方法。Using a method assigned to this property is the preferred way to set the values of a model property. 使用 会设置编辑上下文中的值，在编辑上下文完成之前，将不会更新基础值。Using will set the value in the editing context, which will not update the underlying value until the editing context completes.
